Posts.Content: Jun 18, 2010 09:55AM batoday wrote: I had my firest treatment on Tues.  I still have nausea. I am controlling it with Zofran at day time and with Avtan at night.  Avitan doesn't work as good as Zofran though.  I am tempting to take Zofran at PM too but then I guess i will stay whole night awake. Water tastes strange.  Has anyone experiene this?

Posts.Content: batoday wrote: I was diagnosed with DCIS & IDC in January.  I've had 2 lumpectomies so far, and margin test result of 2nd lumpectomy is positive again.  I will need to have another surgery.  I am trying to stay positive and strong..I know that it will be a very long journey but mulitple surgeries are draining me..  My docor says this will be my last lumpectomy and if the margin is still positve she has no choice to do a mastectomy.  Has anyone had 3 lumpecotmies like me? Dx 1/25/2010, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
